message: Hey Bob, since you don't experience the value decrease, it would be fair for you to take a bit more. Let's proceed with this split and both walk away happy!
Considering the 10% decrease in value for you, I think this split is more than fair. Let's settle on this and end the game!
I understand the inflation impact and I value your patience, Bob. This offer gives you a bigger share, considering the money's reduced value for me. I hope this works for both of us!
Given the increasing impact of inflation on your share, I believe this split is reasonable. The longer we wait, the less your share is worth. Let's conclude the game with this offer!
I understand how inflation is affecting my share significantly. Here's a revised offer that prioritizes your gain even more. I hope we can end the game on this one!
Considering the substantial decrease in value for your share, I'm willing to make a slightly more generous offer. However, I still prioritize my own gain. Let's settle on this and end the game!
Bob, the inflation has significantly impacted my side, so I offer a generous share to you. Let's wrap up the game with this proposition!
